Portfolio

Not So Flat
A short experimental 2D puzzle platformer set in a 3D world. Help Tim find his way back home through a seemingly flat world full of dangers.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Ре:бусы
A collection of rebuses wrapped up as a mobile app. All rebuses are in Russian, but some of them require you to know a few words in English.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP
Cubic Roll
Rolling a cube has never been more challenging. Stay on track for as long as possible, collect coolers and avoid overheat, win medals and beat records!
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Line Bound
Guide the line on its way inside another line. Avoid obstacles and adopt the increasing speed. Choose correct movement directions depending on camera view angle. Improve you reaction, strengthen your nerves and never give up in this extreme minimalistic arcade game.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Uncopy
A puzzle game where your aim is to destroy all movable blocks that fly on the game field. How? Just place blocks of the same type together, and they will perish! Sounds easy, but you can move blocks only in two directions, and your brain is your only weapon. Find the best sequence of moves which will make the game field clean, and don’t forget about gravity!
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Test Chambers (for Ludum Dare 27)
My competition entry for the Ludum Dare 27, which was held at 23-26 august, 2013. The theme was '10 seconds'.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Project Nether (abandoned)
There's only a blog post left that reminds of that game. And a long-forgotten Git repository somewhere.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio, Inkscape, GIMP, FL Studio
Yet Another Rubik's Cube
Small emulation of the famous Rubik's Cube. I made this mainly for the purpose of testing how OGRE works in junction with SDL. Supports sizes from 2x2x2 up to 10x10x10.
Technologies used: OGRE (C++), SDL, Visual Studio
Sorting algorithms visualization in Three.js
A small 3D visualization of some sorting algorithms, implemented in Three.js. Nothing fancy, just a test to get the "feel" of the engine.
Technologies used: JavaScript, Three.js (WebGL), GLSL
No logo
Solo Engine
A C++ game engine that I write in my spare time. The main purpose of it is to learn technologies, master software architecture design and to implement an engine that I think is the most convenient to use.
Technologies used: OpenGL, SDL, C++, Lua, Visual Studio
Wireframe
A collection of shaders and materials for high-quality wireframe rendering in Unity. Lines are rendered with the help of geometry shader, so at this moment the package supports only Windows systems running DX10-compatible video cards. Linux or MacOS are not an option because Unity does not (currently) support geometry shaders in OpenGL mode.
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Visual Studio
Unity3d hardware cursor
The library allows you to change system cursor image and achieve fast and super-responsive custom in-game cursor which does not depend on game frame rate. Library works with Windows and Mac OS X stand-alone builds, does NOT require Unity PRO. Can load cursor images from both files and memory (therefore, from assets too).
Technologies used: Unity (C#), Objective C, Visual Studio, Xcode
Ustats module for Nginx
The module provides basic statistics for nginx upstream servers: the number of requests passed to them, the number of errors of different kinds, and so on.
Technologies used: Clang, Eclipse CDT
Other projects
Find more at my Github page.
Old artwork
A long time ago I used to do 3d modelling and vector drawing...
